title: need help identifying this font
author: VITAMINADO

comments.content:
The closest I could find is  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/viva/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824112656/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/viva/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/viva/")

I'll keep looking....
Thanks, Mike. I recognized it but couldn't come up with the name, and Myfonts classes it as an inline roman, not inline serif (which is what I searched on).
